body.p: Your petition The undersigned would respectfully request your Honer to remit so much of a judgment rendred against him by the Hart Equity & Criminal Court for one hundred dollars on a bail bond for one John Root. For the facts your pititioner refers to a letter directid to your Honer from Wm B Jones commonwealths atty for the district in favor of Hardy & Martin
